titles.title: Pacific Highly Migratory Species Conservation Act of 2002

To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to provide for the conservation of stocks of Pacific highly migratory species by directing the Secretary of Commerce to prohibit pelagic longline fishing in the exclusive economic zone off the coasts of the States of California, Oregon, and Washington.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 4/30/2002--Introduced. Pacific Highly Migratory Species Conservation Act of 2002 - Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to direct the Secretary of Commerce to prohibit pelagic long line fishing for highly migratory species in the exclusive economic zone off the coasts of the States of California, Oregon, and Washington.
